H3.text: where is the carpathian mountain range located. Europe

A4.text: The Carpathian Mountains are a range of mountains forming an arc across Central Europe and Southeast Europe.

A5.text: The range stretches from the Western Carpathians in Austria, the Czech Republic, Slovakia and Poland, clockwise through the Eastern Carpathians in Ukraine and Romania, to the Southern Carpathians in Romania and Serbia.
